body: I'm only getting 2 xp per kill even though I'm gold. Help please?
body_tagged: I'm only getting 2 xp per kill even though I'm gold. Help please?
title: Control the Hill xp glitch

replies.body:
For some reason on Nexus you only get (normaly) 1xp and with Gold Donator 2xp. On Nebula you get (normaly) 1.5xp(i think) and with Gold Donator 3xp. Its more normal get a kill on Nexus than Nebula.
(Sorry bad english :s)
